lyrics:
(Joe)
Everybody say ride wit u, ride wit u, yeah its

50 cent, yeah and lloyd banks, yeah, and young Buck, yeah, and joe. G-Unit!

Look at what we got right here such a work of art

Ride with ya, ride with ya, I wanna move with ya, move with ya, move with ya, I wanna ride with ya, ride with ya, ride with ya, I wanna move with ya, move with ya, move with ya, I wanna ride

The type that just don't care

(Joe x2)
I just want to let you know that, that ooh your so beautiful (your so beautiful) and that Nothings impossible the places that we can go (we can go anywhere baby)
